original: la tshhad _ka ka mi
analyzed: la tshhad _ka ka mi
translated: The measure of the signs🔽The bliss

original: bde ba @#/_/chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam🔽dpal gshin rje gshed por
analyzed: bde ba @#/_/chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por
translated: All phenomena are accomplished as Ārya Mañjuśrī🔽The method of accomplishing Yamāntaka🔽All phenomena are accomplished as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka

original: bsgrub pa'i thabs/ @/_chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por sgrubs pa'i thabs
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i thabs/ @/_chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por sgrubs pa'i thabs
translated: In Sanskrit: Sarva Dharma Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka Sādhana🔽In Tibetan: All phenomena are accomplished as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka🔽The method of accomplishing all phenomena as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka

original: bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba d+harma ar+ya many+dzu shi ya man ta ka
analyzed: bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba d+harma ar+ya many+dzu shi ya man ta ka
translated: In the language of India: Sarva Dharma Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka Sādhana🔽In the language of Tibet: All phenomena are accomplished as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka

original: sa ta no pe ka_/bod skad du/_khor 'das chos skye lugs gsum las thams cad ye nas so so🔽skye bo'i las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'o lta ba rang tad sgoms
analyzed: sa ta no pe ka_/bod skad du/_khor 'das chos skye lugs gsum las thams cad ye nas so so skye bo'i las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'o lta ba rang tad sgoms
translated: The method of accomplishing all phenomena as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka

original: ce gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/_ngo bo nges tshhig dbye ba bstan pa'o thugs bcom ldan rang bzhin
analyzed: ce gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/_ngo bo nges tshhig dbye ba bstan pa'o thugs bcom ldan rang bzhin
translated: The nature, definition, and divisions of the view are explained. The mind of the Bhagavān is the nature

original: rnam pa mtshhan nyid 'das chos sku 'jam dpal longs sku/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes
analyzed: rnam pa mtshhan nyid 'das chos sku 'jam dpal longs sku/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes
translated: The aspect is beyond characteristics. The dharmakāya is Mañjuśrī. The saṃbhogakāya is the mind of all buddhas, the utterly pure gnosis

original: sems dpa' sprul sku la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gang zhig rgyu rkyen phyi ma skyed pas skye dang 'jam bral
analyzed: sems dpa' sprul sku la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gang zhig rgyu rkyen phyi ma skyed pas skye dang 'jam bral
translated: The one who is free from birth and death, because he is not produced by causes and conditions,🔽and because he has conquered birth and death,🔽the glorious one, the one who possesses the wisdom of the excellent characteristics,

original: bas 'chi ba bcom dpal legs pa'i mtshhan nyid ye shes kyi can/_/de la mgon po sems can gyi
analyzed: bas 'chi ba bcom dpal legs pa'i mtshhan nyid ye shes kyi can/_/de la mgon po sems can gyi
translated: to him, the protector of sentient beings,🔽I bow with devotion to Mañjuśrī,

original: spros pa'i zug rngus 'jam pa'i dbyangs la gus pas btud nas/_/ma bcos sol re
analyzed: spros pa'i zug rngus 'jam pa'i dbyangs la gus pas btud nas/_/ma bcos sol re
translated: without the pain of conceptual elaboration,

original: dogs med par lhug par gnas shing goms pa'i tshhe/_/phyi nang gsang ba de kho na bdud bzhi'i
analyzed: dogs med par lhug par gnas shing goms pa'i tshhe/_/phyi nang gsang ba de kho na bdud bzhi'i
translated: without the fear of being uncomposed,🔽and I explain the method of practice

original: chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/
analyzed: chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: in which all phenomena are established as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka,

original: bar chad srung phyir dang po de las thar bar byed pa'i bsgrub thabs bshad/_/phyi 'chi
analyzed: bar chad srung phyir dang po de las thar bar byed pa'i bsgrub thabs bshad/_/phyi 'chi
translated: in order to protect against obstacles and to be liberated from them.🔽The outer obstacle is the demon of death, the inner is the demon of the skandhas,

original: bdag lus kyi bdud nang phung gsang nyon mongs ba don gyi bdud/_/lta ba'i phyogs lhung skye lugs gsum/
analyzed: bdag lus kyi bdud nang phung gsang nyon mongs ba don gyi bdud/_/lta ba'i phyogs lhung skye lugs gsum/
translated: the secret is the demon of afflictions, and the ultimate is the demon of conceptualization.

original: phyi nang gsang de kho na de las thar byed gshed po lhun gsum bzhi/_brtshams pa'i dgos ched me
analyzed: phyi nang gsang de kho na de las thar byed gshed po lhun gsum bzhi/_brtshams pa'i dgos ched me
translated: The four are the outer, inner, secret, and suchness [hells], which are the three spontaneous [hells] of the executioner.🔽The purpose of the boundaries is not to be exceeded.

original: ri ba'i rgyud las 'ongs pa nyid/_/rgyud na rgyas pa 'dir bsdus te dkrugs pa 'dir
analyzed: ri ba'i rgyud las 'ongs pa nyid/_/rgyud na rgyas pa 'dir bsdus te dkrugs pa 'dir
translated: This is the very thing that comes from the tantra, which is extensive in the tantra, condensed here, and mixed here.

original: bsdebs/_/rdo rje'i gdan nas lho phyogs kyi dpag tshhad brgyad khri dang /_/bzhi stong
analyzed: bsdebs/_/rdo rje'i gdan nas lho phyogs kyi dpag tshhad brgyad khri dang /_/bzhi stong
translated: Below the eighty-four thousand leagues to the south of Vajra Seat,🔽in the nine-storied iron house, there is no door.

original: 'das pa'i 'og na lcags khang dgu' rim na/_/sgo med do skye bzhi 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad skye shi
analyzed: 'das pa'i 'og na lcags khang dgu' rim na/_/sgo med do skye bzhi 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad skye shi
translated: Since all four types of birth and all six types of beings are born and die

original: la gnas pas gshin por gyur pa'i/_/srog dang dbugs thams cad dbang du_bsdud cing
analyzed: la gnas pas gshin por gyur pa'i/_/srog dang dbugs thams cad dbang du_bsdud cing
translated: there, it is the lord who subdues and devours all life and breath of the dead.🔽The retinue of that Yama of karma, the one with a hundred heads, is the

original: za bar byed pa'i rje'o/_/'chi' bdag las kyi gshin rje mgo rgu pa de'i 'khor ging po dang /_/ bdud mo nag mo ging kar mo sde brgyad yongs kyi rje de/_/de'i gnyen po bde' gshegs sku'i
analyzed: za bar byed pa'i rje'o/_/'chi' bdag las kyi gshin rje mgo rgu pa de'i 'khor ging po dang /_/ bdud mo nag mo ging kar mo sde brgyad yongs kyi rje de/_/de'i gnyen po bde' gshegs sku'i
translated: king of the eight orders of spirits, the black demoness, and the gingka🔽woman.

original: 'jam dpal sku'i rigs 'dzin pas byin brlabs las/_/'jam dpal de'i sprul pa'i khye chung sngon po
analyzed: 'jam dpal sku'i rigs 'dzin pas byin brlabs las/_/'jam dpal de'i sprul pa'i khye chung sngon po
translated: Manjushri manifested as a blue child.🔽The primordial wisdom Yamantaka of the past

original: sngon 'byung ye shes gshin rje des/_/las kyi gshin rje'i skye 'gro khro bo'i gzugs dang mthun par bstan🔽nas las ci byed na/_//_//bdag srog dbugs za bar byed pa btul te dam la btags
analyzed: sngon 'byung ye shes gshin rje des/_/las kyi gshin rje'i skye 'gro khro bo'i gzugs dang mthun par bstan nas las ci byed na/_//_//bdag srog dbugs za bar byed pa btul te dam la btags
translated: displayed himself in a wrathful form similar to that of the karmic Yamantaka.🔽What did he do? He subdued the one who devours the life-force of others and bound him to an oath.

original: nas zas skal//_/'o na nyid ci za zer ba la za res zhing bcu' bsgrub pa'i chos la bar chad byed pa'o//
analyzed: nas zas skal//_/'o na nyid ci za zer ba la za res zhing bcu' bsgrub pa'i chos la bar chad byed pa'o//
translated: When asked, What will you eat? he replied, I will eat the life-force of those who create obstacles to the ten virtuous actions and the practice of Dharma.

original: dang /_/sems can kun gyi dus las 'chi ba'i zhag bdun bskos kyi snga bar srog las so/
analyzed: dang /_/sems can kun gyi dus las 'chi ba'i zhag bdun bskos kyi snga bar srog las so/
translated: And, I will take the life-force of all sentient beings seven days before their appointed time of death.

original: sngags kyis btab pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam rdzas byin pas/_/des 'chi bdag kyang
analyzed: sngags kyis btab pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam rdzas byin pas/_/des 'chi bdag kyang
translated: Through the blessing of the sacred substances empowered by mantra,🔽the Lord of Death also offered his life-force as a ransom

original: rang gi srog snying mdongs srol du phul nas/_/bstan pa srung bar dam bcas ste/_/
analyzed: rang gi srog snying mdongs srol du phul nas/_/bstan pa srung bar dam bcas ste/_/
translated: and pledged to protect the teachings.

original: gsang sngags che bas 'i nga rgyal gyi dbang bskur nas/_/'dzin pa drag po'i_che sa che
analyzed: gsang sngags che bas 'i nga rgyal gyi dbang bskur nas/_/'dzin pa drag po'i_che sa che
translated: the great and fierce pride is generated.🔽Liberated from the two, birth and death,

original: rgyal ni bskyed/_/skye shi gnyis kyi sa las sgral/_/'das shakya thub kyi bstan pa 'dis nas
analyzed: rgyal ni bskyed/_/skye shi gnyis kyi sa las sgral/_/'das shakya thub kyi bstan pa 'dis nas
translated: having been given the prophecy of the nirmanakaya,

original: grol 'jig rten las bar lung phog pas/_/gnyis kyi mtshhams su gzhag go/_/phyi'am gshin rje de'i
analyzed: grol 'jig rten las bar lung phog pas/_/gnyis kyi mtshhams su gzhag go/_/phyi'am gshin rje de'i
translated: he is placed in the interval between the two.

original: yang gshed por rgyud las grags pa yin/_/gshed po de'i rjes su 'jug cing bsgrub par
analyzed: yang gshed por rgyud las grags pa yin/_/gshed po de'i rjes su 'jug cing bsgrub par
translated: He is known in the tantras as the executioner of the executioner of the dead,🔽Yama.🔽The branch of protection for the yogi who practices🔽and enters into the path of that executioner is

original: byed pa'i/_/rnal 'byor srung ba'i yan lag ni/_/dang po bsnyen cing bar du bsgrubs
analyzed: byed pa'i/_/rnal 'byor srung ba'i yan lag ni/_/dang po bsnyen cing bar du bsgrubs
translated: first to approach, in the middle to accomplish,🔽and in the end to apply to the activity.🔽The approach and accomplishment of the three spontaneously present

original: te mthar las la sbyar/_/don lhun grub gsum gyi bsnyen bsgrub rgyud la sbyar/_/dang po
analyzed: te mthar las la sbyar/_/don lhun grub gsum gyi bsnyen bsgrub rgyud la sbyar/_/dang po
translated: meanings is applied to the continuum.🔽If the wisdom deity is approached,

original: ye shes lha nye bar bsnyen na/_/bar chad bsal thabs phyi nang gsang ba de kho na cha gsum
analyzed: ye shes lha nye bar bsnyen na/_/bar chad bsal thabs phyi nang gsang ba de kho na cha gsum
translated: the method of removing obstacles is the three: outer, inner, and secret.

original: legs/_/phyi'i 'gron dgye' phyogs skyong bcu' rgyal chen bzhi la/_/rten mthong gzugs mtho
analyzed: legs/_/phyi'i 'gron dgye' phyogs skyong bcu' rgyal chen bzhi la/_/rten mthong gzugs mtho
translated: The outer guests are the ten direction protectors and the four great kings.🔽Make offerings and assign them their tasks according to the ritual.🔽Do this in the early morning. Drive out the samaya violators. Give a red torma with wheat flour and iron filings.

original: cho ga ltar mchod cing las la bgo'/_/snga mor byas la dam sri bskrad dmar gtor la gro phye dang lcags phye can byin/_thugs ka nas de las rlung gi rnga mo gdeng ser por bskyed de la phyag rgya dam sri bstim 'jug rlung gi
analyzed: cho ga ltar mchod cing las la bgo'/_/snga mor byas la dam sri bskrad dmar gtor la gro phye dang lcags phye can byin/_thugs ka nas de las rlung gi rnga mo gdeng ser por bskyed de la phyag rgya dam sri bstim 'jug rlung gi
translated: From your heart, generate a yellow wind camel from that.🔽The wind camel carries the samaya violator to the palace of the Dharma king.

original: chos kyi rgyal po'i khang par 'phang phyir mi 'chor bar gnyer gtad gnan bgegs rgyal pos btang gnan gyi/_/
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po'i khang par 'phang phyir mi 'chor bar gnyer gtad gnan bgegs rgyal pos btang gnan gyi/_/
translated: The king of obstructors is entrusted with the responsibility of preventing the violator from returning.🔽The violator enters the womb of the palace.

original: gzhal las khang du du sbubs su zhugs de'i phyi nang srung ba sgo la gdags/_/lta ba de kho na nyag
analyzed: gzhal las khang du du sbubs su zhugs de'i phyi nang srung ba sgo la gdags/_/lta ba de kho na nyag
translated: The outer and inner protection is placed on the door.🔽The view is the sign of abiding in the meaning of suchness.

original: cig don la rtags gnas pas/_/phyi nang stong par rgyas btab bar chod bral/_/
analyzed: cig don la rtags gnas pas/_/phyi nang stong par rgyas btab bar chod bral/_/
translated: The outer and inner emptiness is sealed. Obstacles are absent.🔽The inner emanation of illusion is cut off.

original: nang sprul pa sgyu mas tshhar bcad pas/_/'on kyang blo bur gyi rtog bgegs zhi/_/
analyzed: nang sprul pa sgyu mas tshhar bcad pas/_/'on kyang blo bur gyi rtog bgegs zhi/_/
translated: Nevertheless, the temporary conceptual obstructors are pacified.

original: dgos pa dngos grub dam pa'i snod kyi dri ma sbyang ba/_/kun gzhi la rten pa'i zhen pa'i bag
analyzed: dgos pa dngos grub dam pa'i snod kyi dri ma sbyang ba/_/kun gzhi la rten pa'i zhen pa'i bag
translated: The purpose is to purify the stains of the vessel of the sublime siddhi.🔽The thick latent tendencies of clinging based on the all-basis

original: chags stug pos yang dag pa'i dngos grub sgrib par byed par de/_/dbang po dmigs te gdung
analyzed: chags stug pos yang dag pa'i dngos grub sgrib par byed par de/_/dbang po dmigs te gdung
translated: obscure the perfect siddhi.🔽Since the mind is tormented by the intense pain of regret,

original: ba'i sems dang bcas pas/_/snod tshhig 'gyod pa'i gdung ba shugs bcas dbyung /_/
analyzed: ba'i sems dang bcas pas/_/snod tshhig 'gyod pa'i gdung ba shugs bcas dbyung /_/
translated: the vessel is purified by the intense pain of regret.

original: gang nyes pa dran pas ra bya la yul la 'jug ngag du bton la bshags/_/rnam rtog gyod
analyzed: gang nyes pa dran pas ra bya la yul la 'jug ngag du bton la bshags/_/rnam rtog gyod
translated: Since one remembers the faults, one should confess with regret and🔽intense pain.🔽Since the fire of great gnosis burns the regret of concepts,

original: shing ye shes chen po'i mes bsregs shing /_/rig pas btags pas rtog pa rang bzhin
analyzed: shing ye shes chen po'i mes bsregs shing /_/rig pas btags pas rtog pa rang bzhin
translated: and since one is branded by vidyā, one understands that concepts are🔽essenceless.🔽Since one’s appearances are purified by the light, the latent tendencies

original: med par shes pa de ldog_/rang snang 'od kyis ma rig bag chags sel/_/sgo gsum lhar gsal
analyzed: med par shes pa de ldog_/rang snang 'od kyis ma rig bag chags sel/_/sgo gsum lhar gsal
translated: of ignorance are removed.🔽Since the three doors are clear as the deity,

original: ba'i /na byespyod lam gyi chags kyi dri chags kyi dri mdag la lus ngag yid gsum ltar gsal/_/
analyzed: ba'i /na byespyod lam gyi chags kyi dri chags kyi dri mdag la lus ngag yid gsum ltar gsal/_/
translated: the stains of body, voice, and mind are purified.

original: dam chig gi bdud rtshi brlab zla steng rdzas lnga bkod yig 'bru lngas 'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtshi sbyang /_/srin
analyzed: dam chig gi bdud rtshi brlab zla steng rdzas lnga bkod yig 'bru lngas 'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtshi sbyang /_/srin
translated: The five seed syllables on the moon above the consecration of the elixir of the commitment being and the wisdom being melt and dissolve into the elixir, purifying it.

original: mtheb bar du hri dmigs te de las bdud rtshi bab la dang gong ma/_hum dkar ser gsang chen ye shes kyi bdud rtshi
analyzed: mtheb bar du hri dmigs te de las bdud rtshi bab la dang gong ma/_hum dkar ser gsang chen ye shes kyi bdud rtshi
translated: The elixir falls from the syllable hrīḥ in the space between the thumb and forefinger, and the elixir of the great secret pristine awareness is the same as before.

original: rang bzhin med par shes pa ste nyag cig 'bru dgus drang zhing /_/rta'i ye shes kyi hri 'bru bsdus
analyzed: rang bzhin med par shes pa ste nyag cig 'bru dgus drang zhing /_/rta'i ye shes kyi hri 'bru bsdus
translated: The elixir is the nature of the nine syllables, and the syllable hrīḥ of the pristine awareness being is gathered into the elixir.

original: dam dang gnyis su med par bsrel/_/nyes pa ces pas bdag slob ma dag bi shud+has bsal la bsang
analyzed: dam dang gnyis su med par bsrel/_/nyes pa ces pas bdag slob ma dag bi shud+has bsal la bsang
translated: The elixir is mixed inseparably with the commitment being, and the faults of the disciple and oneself are purified by viśuddha.🔽The offering torma is given, and obstacles are prevented by the yakṣa.

original: gtor bya yag shas bar chod bsrung /_/nyi ma ma las rang gi thugs ka nas pam las chu skyes a las zla
analyzed: gtor bya yag shas bar chod bsrung /_/nyi ma ma las rang gi thugs ka nas pam las chu skyes a las zla
translated: From the sun maṃ in one’s heart, a lotus arises from paṃ, and on that, an āḥ becomes a moon.

original: chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs
analyzed: chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs
translated: The method of accomplishing all phenomena as the sublime Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka🔽. On the seat, the heart is a blue hūṃ, the speech is a red āḥ, and the body is a white oṃ.

original: gdan la/_/hum mthing thugs a dmar gsung chadakar sku'i snying pos bskul/_/sru hum sa ma ya
analyzed: gdan la/_/hum mthing thugs a dmar gsung chadakar sku'i snying pos bskul/_/sru hum sa ma ya
translated: The elixir is summoned with the essence mantra.

original: ste hum ya ra na phat hu~m sang ha ra na rgyu des 'dre'o/_/sbyang dkyil ye shes lha mos drug gis dgang /_/de
analyzed: ste hum ya ra na phat hu~m sang ha ra na rgyu des 'dre'o/_/sbyang dkyil ye shes lha mos drug gis dgang /_/de
translated: The six goddesses of the wisdom mandala fill the skull cup with the nectar of wisdom.🔽Then, with MA VAJRA AMRITA HUM, the skull cup becomes a deep blue, with a red A and a white OM.

original: nas ma badzra a mri ta hum mthing /_a dmar/_a bi shu ta/_de nas badzra yag sha kro tas bgegs bskrad 'dus pas khro bo'i
analyzed: nas ma badzra a mri ta hum mthing /_a dmar/_a bi shu ta/_de nas badzra yag sha kro tas bgegs bskrad 'dus pas khro bo'i
translated: Then, with VAJRA YAKSHA KRODHA, the obstacles are expelled.

original: gur du gyur/_a las ka pa la ces ban d+ha gzhal yas su ram sbyangs gyis rag ta sregs/_/ra
analyzed: gur du gyur/_a las ka pa la ces ban d+ha gzhal yas su ram sbyangs gyis rag ta sregs/_/ra
translated: The skull cup becomes a celestial palace, and with RAM, the nectar is purified and burned away.🔽With RAM, the nectar becomes a red ocean, and with BHANDHA, the inner goddess is filled with red nectar.

original: ra las rag ta phyi rag ta'i rgya mtshho nang lha mo dmar mo ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba/_gsang ba pad+ma yum gyi/_snya
analyzed: ra las rag ta phyi rag ta'i rgya mtshho nang lha mo dmar mo ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba/_gsang ba pad+ma yum gyi/_snya
translated: The secret nectar is the blood in the heart of the mother lotus.

original: ga'i rak+ta/_bde bskyed pa tshhar gsum bskyed/_/ming gi yig ge dang po du lha mo su rang
analyzed: ga'i rak+ta/_bde bskyed pa tshhar gsum bskyed/_/ming gi yig ge dang po du lha mo su rang
translated: The first syllable of the name of the deity becomes a goddess who dissolves into the ear of the sound goddess.🔽The outer goddess dissolves into the ear of the sound goddess.

original: sngags a gzhan dang phyag rgyas/_/phyi'i lha mo so sor sgra'i lha mo snyan la thim sogs sbyar/_/sprul
analyzed: sngags a gzhan dang phyag rgyas/_/phyi'i lha mo so sor sgra'i lha mo snyan la thim sogs sbyar/_/sprul
translated: The emanated goddesses dissolve into the ears of the wisdom goddesses.

original: pa logs na yod dam zhe na soms kyi mchod pa'i cho 'phrul yin/_/hum gang ltar yang mi rtog stong
analyzed: pa logs na yod dam zhe na soms kyi mchod pa'i cho 'phrul yin/_/hum gang ltar yang mi rtog stong
translated: In any case, nonconceptual emptiness🔽is the nature free from elaborations, bliss itself,

original: nyid spros rang bzhin rang dang bral bde ba de nyid/_/rang snang rig pa mtshhan nyid mkha' ltar
analyzed: nyid spros rang bzhin rang dang bral bde ba de nyid/_/rang snang rig pa mtshhan nyid mkha' ltar
translated: self-appearing vidyā, vast like space,

original: yangs de /_//_//dbyer med thugs rnams kyi rang rtags hum de/_/brtan par bya bas
analyzed: yangs de /_//_//dbyer med thugs rnams kyi rang rtags hum de/_/brtan par bya bas
translated: and the sign of the inseparability of the minds of all buddhas is hūṃ.🔽The basis of all maṇḍalas, such as the emanation and gathering of hūṃs,

original: 'phro 'du gnas pa 'phro 'du la sogs dal kun gyi gzhi/_/mkha' lnga yum lnga'i dbyings sdus pa
analyzed: 'phro 'du gnas pa 'phro 'du la sogs dal kun gyi gzhi/_/mkha' lnga yum lnga'i dbyings sdus pa
translated: is the space of the five mothers, the five mothers,

original: nyid drug rang rig kyi mkha'/_/'byung ba lnga rnam par dag pas ngang la gnas/_/gos
analyzed: nyid drug rang rig kyi mkha'/_/'byung ba lnga rnam par dag pas ngang la gnas/_/gos
translated: and the space of one’s vidyā, the space of the five pure elements.

original: med thabs zla ba dang shes rab nyi las/_/gshin rje pho mo gdul bya zil gnan 'phrin las
analyzed: med thabs zla ba dang shes rab nyi las/_/gshin rje pho mo gdul bya zil gnan 'phrin las
translated: Since there is no garment, the method is the moon and the wisdom is the sun.🔽The activity of subduing the male and female Rudras is the emanation and gathering of Yamāntaka.

original: dus su srin po ru tra pho mo las la ya ma bsnyen bsgrub dus su skul_/_/rnam rtog srin bu ru tra dbang
analyzed: dus su srin po ru tra pho mo las la ya ma bsnyen bsgrub dus su skul_/_/rnam rtog srin bu ru tra dbang
translated: At the time of the approach and accomplishment, the male and female rākṣasas are summoned.

original: sdus rig par byang sems su gsal/_/ya ma'i skabs kyi lho phyogs kyis ya ma nyon mongs pa'i nga
analyzed: sdus rig par byang sems su gsal/_/ya ma'i skabs kyi lho phyogs kyis ya ma nyon mongs pa'i nga
translated: The south of Yama's section is Yama, the pacification of the affliction of pride.

original: rgyal zhi ba ma te/_/che ba bde' gshegs rig pa rang snang du kun gyi pho brang rdzogs/_/yab
analyzed: rgyal zhi ba ma te/_/che ba bde' gshegs rig pa rang snang du kun gyi pho brang rdzogs/_/yab
translated: The great palace of all is perfect in the self-appearance of the vidya of the sugatas.

original: sku dang yum gsung thugs thugs phyi nang gsang ba dgu sprugs/_/yab yum rig sku'i khyon
analyzed: sku dang yum gsung thugs thugs phyi nang gsang ba dgu sprugs/_/yab yum rig sku'i khyon
translated: The father's body, the mother's speech, and the mind are perfect in the dimension of the vidya of the father and mother.

original: du rdzogs/_/khams gsum srid gsum lus ngag yid gsum nang gi 'jam dpal du nang gi 'jam
analyzed: du rdzogs/_/khams gsum srid gsum lus ngag yid gsum nang gi 'jam dpal du nang gi 'jam
translated: The three realms, the three existences, and the three of body, voice, and mind are the inner Manjushri.

original: dpal rnam par dag pa ni/_/'dir bsdus pas rtsha lha'i ba'i ma 'dal la/_/gshed po
analyzed: dpal rnam par dag pa ni/_/'dir bsdus pas rtsha lha'i ba'i ma 'dal la/_/gshed po
translated: The inner Manjushri is perfect in the gathering here.

original: bzhi ye shes rang snang lha thugs ye shes la bskyed chog mi dgos par rdzogs/_/sras mchog yon tan
analyzed: bzhi ye shes rang snang lha thugs ye shes la bskyed chog mi dgos par rdzogs/_/sras mchog yon tan
translated: The four butchers are perfect in the self-appearance of pristine consciousness without needing to be generated in the mind of pristine consciousness.🔽The three heroines are perfect in the qualities of the supreme son.

original: ma mo gsum 'phrin las gshed po ni/_/cha las grags pa 'gron gyi phyogs skyong dur khrod sgo
analyzed: ma mo gsum 'phrin las gshed po ni/_/cha las grags pa 'gron gyi phyogs skyong dur khrod sgo
translated: The butchers are perfect in the activity of the three dakinis.

original: ma'o lha'o/_/lha srin sde sgom phyogs skyong ye shes kyi brgyad mon pho mon mo bal mo gsum du bsdus pa las
analyzed: ma'o lha'o/_/lha srin sde sgom phyogs skyong ye shes kyi brgyad mon pho mon mo bal mo gsum du bsdus pa las
translated: The eight directional wisdom guardians of the gods and rakshasas are included in the three: the male Mon, the female Mon, and the Nepalese women.

original: la sbyar/_/bskul ba'i hum 'od de'i sbyor ba'i thugs rjes las gnas lngar byung ba/_/bo de'i
analyzed: la sbyar/_/bskul ba'i hum 'od de'i sbyor ba'i thugs rjes las gnas lngar byung ba/_/bo de'i
translated: The compassion of the application of the light of the hūṃ that impels the five places of karma arises from the bodhicitta.

original: rten la phyogs skyong don gyis bskul ba'i rtags/_/thod pa'i khang rigs zhi ba lnga'i bud
analyzed: rten la phyogs skyong don gyis bskul ba'i rtags/_/thod pa'i khang rigs zhi ba lnga'i bud
translated: The sign of the impelling of the five families of peaceful deities is the five-tined vajra.🔽The five pristine consciousnesses are complete.

original: lnga'i ye shes lnga rdzogs pa ste/_/tshhogs brgyad ye shes lnga rang grol bde chen dbang thob/_/🔽rang thugs ye shes snang ba'i 'od yi ge gsum nyid las sku sku gsung a thugs thugs /_/lus ngag
analyzed: lnga'i ye shes lnga rdzogs pa ste/_/tshhogs brgyad ye shes lnga rang grol bde chen dbang thob/_/ rang thugs ye shes snang ba'i 'od yi ge gsum nyid las sku sku gsung a thugs thugs /_/lus ngag
translated: The eight assemblies are self-liberated in the five pristine consciousnesses.🔽The light of one’s pristine consciousness is the three syllables.🔽The supreme empowerment of the great bliss of the body, voice, and mind is the blessing of the three kāyas.

original: yid gsum ka pag tshir byin brlabs mchog_/gsang ba sngags kyi sgo bzhi ni sgron ma gsal byed don
analyzed: yid gsum ka pag tshir byin brlabs mchog_/gsang ba sngags kyi sgo bzhi ni sgron ma gsal byed don
translated: The four doors of secret mantra are the lamp that illuminates the meaning.

original: dam mchog gi sgo thugs dam bskul tshhig byed gsang bsngags kyi sgo mtshhan ma brda' rtags phyag rgya gar gyi sgo dmigs pa rtshe
analyzed: dam mchog gi sgo thugs dam bskul tshhig byed gsang bsngags kyi sgo mtshhan ma brda' rtags phyag rgya gar gyi sgo dmigs pa rtshe
translated: The door of the supreme sacred pledge is the invocation of the mind.🔽The door of secret mantra is the symbolic signs and mudras. The door of dance is the visualization of the single-pointed samadhi.

original: gcig ting 'dzin sgom pa'i sgo skul tshhig sngags rgya ting 'dzin gyis/_/skur bzhengs drang
analyzed: gcig ting 'dzin sgom pa'i sgo skul tshhig sngags rgya ting 'dzin gyis/_/skur bzhengs drang
translated: The door of invocation is the arising of the form through mantra, mudra, and samadhi.

original: zhing brtan byas te/_/gnas sa ma mo gsum bsnyen bzla gam skabs kyis las sbyor 'khyam so
analyzed: zhing brtan byas te/_/gnas sa ma mo gsum bsnyen bzla gam skabs kyis las sbyor 'khyam so
translated: The door of the place is the three samaya mothers. The door of the time is the recitation and the repetition of the practice.

original: sor sbyar/_/de dag rang rang stan dang lag char bcas/_/lung gi sgo bzhis sna la phyag🔽'tshhal phyag btshal phyi'i su tsha lnga dbul/_/de nas lha mo thim dag pa'i rdzas lnga dug gtor mar
analyzed: sor sbyar/_/de dag rang rang stan dang lag char bcas/_/lung gi sgo bzhis sna la phyag 'tshhal phyag btshal phyi'i su tsha lnga dbul/_/de nas lha mo thim dag pa'i rdzas lnga dug gtor mar
translated: Each of those has its own seat and implements.🔽The door of the scriptures is the five outer prostrations.🔽Then, the goddess dissolves. The five pure substances, the poison torma, the two rakta, and the abundant offerings are placed in front.

original: rak+ta gnyis gsum dang /_/'byor pa'i tshhogs dag drung bzhag dus bzhir bstab/_/he
analyzed: rak+ta gnyis gsum dang /_/'byor pa'i tshhogs dag drung bzhag dus bzhir bstab/_/he
translated: The four times are offered.🔽Heruka is requested to contemplate, and the offerings, confession, and urging for siddhi are performed.

original: ru kas dgongs su gsol nas mchod bshags dngos grub la bskul/_/las bsgo 'dod
analyzed: ru kas dgongs su gsol nas mchod bshags dngos grub la bskul/_/las bsgo 'dod
translated: The activity is entrusted.

original: pas gsol ba gdab/_/_gtum chen gyis bstod cing bskul la ye shes lha'i bsnyen pa drang //
analyzed: pas gsol ba gdab/_/_gtum chen gyis bstod cing bskul la ye shes lha'i bsnyen pa drang //
translated: Make supplications, praise with “Great Fierce One,” and invoke the recitation of the awareness deity.

original: rig pa nyid yig 'bru bcu bdun lhar de nyid lha bcu bdun gyi ngo bo drangs te/_/lha du bzlas phar
analyzed: rig pa nyid yig 'bru bcu bdun lhar de nyid lha bcu bdun gyi ngo bo drangs te/_/lha du bzlas phar
translated: The awareness itself is invoked as the deity of the seventeen seed syllables, the essence of the seventeen deities.🔽  The recitation of the deity is the first.

original: spros dam bskul las bdag gzhan gyis rdzogs pa ni dang po'o/_/shes pa skye lugs rang grol don
analyzed: spros dam bskul las bdag gzhan gyis rdzogs pa ni dang po'o/_/shes pa skye lugs rang grol don
translated: The way of generating the consciousness is invoked as the meaning of self-liberation.🔽  The three appearances are pure as the aspect of the deity and mantra.

original: du drangs pas lhun gsum rnam pa lha dang sngags su dag_/sgo gsum rang snang gnyis par
analyzed: du drangs pas lhun gsum rnam pa lha dang sngags su dag_/sgo gsum rang snang gnyis par
translated: The three doors are self-apparent.🔽  The inner speech is recited as a mantra in the vajra of the mind.🔽  The body is the awareness of the mind.🔽  The speech is the mantra.

original: bskyad rdo rje'i nang du 'gal me ltar/_/nang gi gsung sngags su bzlas la sku ye shes kyi gshin rje thugs rdo rje
analyzed: bskyad rdo rje'i nang du 'gal me ltar/_/nang gi gsung sngags su bzlas la sku ye shes kyi gshin rje thugs rdo rje
translated: The mind is the vajra.🔽  The recitation is performed until the visualization is clear.🔽  The power is generated.

original: gsung sngags/_gzhan du mi dmigs par gsal bar du dmigs pas nus pa bskyed 'khor lor bskor/_/
analyzed: gsung sngags/_gzhan du mi dmigs par gsal bar du dmigs pas nus pa bskyed 'khor lor bskor/_/
translated: The wheel is turned.🔽  Since the power is produced, the activities of burning, expelling, and so on, are accomplished with any fierce mantra.

original: nus pa thon pas drag sngags gang bsreg 'phang sogs las rnams 'grub/_/the tshom med
analyzed: nus pa thon pas drag sngags gang bsreg 'phang sogs las rnams 'grub/_/the tshom med
translated: There is no doubt.

original: blos gong gi lha don sngags don gsum lha don sngags 'grub/_/'jug sdud zhal mthong gi bstod pas
analyzed: blos gong gi lha don sngags don gsum lha don sngags 'grub/_/'jug sdud zhal mthong gi bstod pas
translated: The praise of seeing the face of the one who enters and gathers

analyzed: thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: establishes everything as Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka.

original: rnam gsum don lha don sngags su yid kyi mos par bstod la sbyar/_/las grub ging po dang ging
analyzed: rnam gsum don lha don sngags su yid kyi mos par bstod la sbyar/_/las grub ging po dang ging
translated: The meaning of the three is applied to the mental aspiration of the meaning of the deity and the meaning of the mantra.🔽The remainder water is given to the accomplished ging and

analyzed: lcam 'khor bcas la/_/lhag ma kha chus 'dod pa sbyin/_/gtor len bskang zhing
translated: the ging consort and retinue.🔽The torma is offered to the one who takes the torma, and🔽the activity is entrusted.

original: las bcol bya/_/grub gtor tshho gsum dang po zhi ba'i me lha mchod/_/bar ma mi
analyzed: las bcol bya/_/grub gtor tshho gsum dang po zhi ba'i me lha mchod/_/bar ma mi
translated: The three times of the accomplished torma are first offered to the peaceful fire god,

original: bzad gter chen dal 'og tu ste/_/tha ma gtan ma bdud ma gsum gyis mos zor kha 'phang
analyzed: bzad gter chen dal 'og tu ste/_/tha ma gtan ma bdud ma gsum gyis mos zor kha 'phang
translated: in the middle to the great unbearable treasure mandala,🔽and in the end, the three of the never-ending māras are said to be the torma of fulfillment.🔽From traṃ, imagine a jeweled vessel.

original: bskang zer/_/tram las rin chen 'a 'dan tre log spar na phat ces pas mchod sdong du dmigs la 'gron
analyzed: bskang zer/_/tram las rin chen 'a 'dan tre log spar na phat ces pas mchod sdong du dmigs la 'gron

analyzed: khyab par byas pas/_/tshhogs chen po gnyis ka po gnyis res 'jog med par zung la tshhig chod du
translated: by the two great gaṇas, and the two are taken in pairs without alternation.

original: gnas/_/nang gi snying po'i rba gi 'od zer gyis/_/dpe khab len gyis ni lcags
analyzed: gnas/_/nang gi snying po'i rba gi 'od zer gyis/_/dpe khab len gyis ni lcags
translated: The light rays of the inner essence🔽gather the creation from the periphery to the center, like a magnet🔽gathering iron.

original: sdud ltar/_/mtha' dbus nas skyed la nas rang rig par bsdus te snying por rgyu bskyal/
analyzed: sdud ltar/_/mtha' dbus nas skyed la nas rang rig par bsdus te snying por rgyu bskyal/
translated: The creation is brought to the essence, and the self-awareness is🔽gathered.🔽The self-clarity is clear as the deity, and the body is protected.

original: dad las rang gsal lhar gsal lus bsrungs la/_/'gro' nyal 'dug sdod tshhe/_/
analyzed: dad las rang gsal lhar gsal lus bsrungs la/_/'gro' nyal 'dug sdod tshhe/_/
translated: Whether walking, sleeping, sitting, or standing,🔽the meaning of clarity is never lost.

original: gsal ba'i don las ma nyams rgyun gyis de bzhin sbyar hum hum hum/_/rtags yig brgya bcu pa ltar
analyzed: gsal ba'i don las ma nyams rgyun gyis de bzhin sbyar hum hum hum/_/rtags yig brgya bcu pa ltar
translated: The signs are examined, good or bad, like the one hundred and ten🔽signs. If bad, the obstacles are removed.

original: mtshhan ma bzang ngan brtag cing ngan na bar chod bsal/_/bsnyen lha'i rtags bzang ba tshhad
analyzed: mtshhan ma bzang ngan brtag cing ngan na bar chod bsal/_/bsnyen lha'i rtags bzang ba tshhad
translated: When the signs of the approach deity are good,🔽the siddhi of the good vase is gathered.

analyzed: la phebs nas tshhul bzang ba'i dngos grub bsdu'/_/sgrub pa'i bar chod bsal phyir rang gi
translated: In order to remove the obstacles of the accomplishment,🔽accomplish one’s own purpose.🔽In order to protect the retinue,🔽the eight classes are killed with the mantra of killing and fierce

analyzed: don bsgrub pa/_/'khor nyen che gsung lo sogs gsad pa dang drag sngags kyis gsad pa sde
translated: mantras.🔽In this, whatever one has devotion to, the five meats, is the karma

analyzed: brgyad tshhogs/_/'di la bca' lnga gang la mos pa la las 'phro' yod pa yin che/_/drag

analyzed: ba zor 'phang ba'i las bya zhing /_/glu sogs gdug pa'i can gyis tshhogs la gtad dam
translated: assembly of the harmful spirits.🔽Or, if the harmful spirit is in the body, it is pressed down with a stake.

original: gdon de'i lus la gzer du mnan yang na gnan pa bya/_/grub nas klus bdag ga zhing gnan pa
analyzed: gdon de'i lus la gzer du mnan yang na gnan pa bya/_/grub nas klus bdag ga zhing gnan pa
translated: After the accomplishment, it is important to extract the naga🔽lord and to release the earth.🔽If one is ill, the treasure of medicinal herbs, the noose of poison, and

original: dbyung ba dang btang rags btang ba gces/_/rtshi sman gyi gter tshhab dug zhags gdon gnod pa la'ang
analyzed: dbyung ba dang btang rags btang ba gces/_/rtshi sman gyi gter tshhab dug zhags gdon gnod pa la'ang
translated: the harmful spirit are also like that.🔽If one is able to perform the rite, it is best.

original: gong gi de bzhin las brtshams na mchog du shis/_/'gro ba'i nang lus 'byung ba bzhis la
analyzed: gong gi de bzhin las brtshams na mchog du shis/_/'gro ba'i nang lus 'byung ba bzhis la
translated: Since the body of a living being is🔽accomplished by the four elements, it is compounded. Therefore, the

original: bsgrubs pas/_/'dus byas yin des na 'bras bu 'jig pa'i gshin po ste/_/dus skad
analyzed: bsgrubs pas/_/'dus byas yin des na 'bras bu 'jig pa'i gshin po ste/_/dus skad
translated: result is the corpse that perishes.🔽In the time of a single instant, the🔽years are divided into an earlier and a later. Thirty years increase and

analyzed: cig ma'i snga phyir kyis 'gyur ba'i lo sum cu yar 'gyur de nas mar 'gyur go 'byed rje/_/de bsgral ba'i
translated: then decrease.🔽The liberation of that is

original: thabs de'i gshed por lus skye 'jigs med par rdo rjer bsgrub/_/spyi mgrin lte snying 'khor lo lnga
analyzed: thabs de'i gshed por lus skye 'jigs med par rdo rjer bsgrub/_/spyi mgrin lte snying 'khor lo lnga
translated: The five wheels at the crown, throat, heart, navel, and secret place are🔽the wheels of the conditions of fire and air.

original: nyid me rlung rkyen gyi 'khor lo rim nas rim mas rlung yar 'bar rigs lnga 'am rdo rje sems dpa' yas 'dzag pas
analyzed: nyid me rlung rkyen gyi 'khor lo rim nas rim mas rlung yar 'bar rigs lnga 'am rdo rje sems dpa' yas 'dzag pas
translated: The vāyu blazes upward in stages, and the five families or Vajrasattva🔽descend.

original: so/bskul ba'i ting 'dzin drag po bsgom/_/dam rdzas mu zi la sogs pa lnga skyobs
analyzed: so/bskul ba'i ting 'dzin drag po bsgom/_/dam rdzas mu zi la sogs pa lnga skyobs
translated: The five samaya substances, such as bitumen, and so on, are protected🔽by the five fierce amṛtas.

original: bcas sman rtsha ba lnga'i nang nas nye shing ba'i bcud blang /_/lhun gsum snying po rnal ma nges par
analyzed: bcas sman rtsha ba lnga'i nang nas nye shing ba'i bcud blang /_/lhun gsum snying po rnal ma nges par

analyzed: rnyed nas rig pa gsal bas rnam par ma g.yos par 'grub/_/brda' dang yul dge slong zong zad zong med ma ning bzhir gsang ba'i las/_/rang ka med na nas zhen spyod 'dod pas ngan song
translated: without wavering.🔽If the four secret activities—the sign, the place, the bhikṣu, and the🔽unowned goods—are not one’s own, then one will be reborn in the three

analyzed: gsum gshin por skye bar byed/_/thig le'u nus pas skam chags zhen pas rang kha'i rang dbang med
translated: lower realms, such as the realm of the hungry ghosts, due to the desire🔽to enjoy what one is attached to.🔽The bindu is the moisture. Since one is attached to moisture, one is🔽not independent.

original: pa sred pa rje 'o/_/de'i thabs gshed po bde stong bsgrub/_/thabs ni gsang ba'i yab rdo
analyzed: pa sred pa rje 'o/_/de'i thabs gshed po bde stong bsgrub/_/thabs ni gsang ba'i yab rdo
translated: The method is the secret father, the vajra, and the mother, the lotus.

original: rje'i yum pad+ma'i sras bde stong phrad pas khams gsum ma spangs rol/_/thig le'i nus pas
analyzed: rje'i yum pad+ma'i sras bde stong phrad pas khams gsum ma spangs rol/_/thig le'i nus pas
translated: The son, bliss and emptiness, meets, and the three realms are enjoyed without being abandoned.🔽The power of the bindu generates the bliss of emptiness.🔽The bindu descends from the place of passion to the lake.

original: stong nyid kyi bde' ba skye'o/_/rtsha gnas nas rdzing du dbab gzung rdo rje'i rtsha bar dkyil zlog skyed
analyzed: stong nyid kyi bde' ba skye'o/_/rtsha gnas nas rdzing du dbab gzung rdo rje'i rtsha bar dkyil zlog skyed
translated: The bindu is generated in the vajra palace.🔽The vāyu is the life-sustaining vāyu.🔽The bindu is the essence.

original: pa nas rlung srog lus bzungs bcud bsre'/_/snying por lhun gsum don gsal 'dus ma byas rdo
analyzed: pa nas rlung srog lus bzungs bcud bsre'/_/snying por lhun gsum don gsal 'dus ma byas rdo
translated: The three spontaneously present appearances are the unfabricated three kāyas.🔽Since the meaning of the truth is not seen,

original: rjer 'grub/_/bden par don gnas pa ma mthong bas/_/yin par de ma yin la
analyzed: rjer 'grub/_/bden par don gnas pa ma mthong bas/_/yin par de ma yin la
translated: the non-existent is apprehended as existent.🔽The deluded one is deceived.🔽The dead person ripens in birth, old age, sickness, and death.

original: bzung ba nor pas bslus/_/gshin po skye rga na 'chir smin/_/rje bo sgo lnga nyon yid
analyzed: bzung ba nor pas bslus/_/gshin po skye rga na 'chir smin/_/rje bo sgo lnga nyon yid
translated: The lord is the five gates and the afflicted mind.🔽The three modes of arising are indicated.

original: rnam skye lugs gsum nyid du mtshhungs/_/de'i gshed po lhun gsum bden par gnas pa lha//
analyzed: rnam skye lugs gsum nyid du mtshhungs/_/de'i gshed po lhun gsum bden par gnas pa lha//
translated: The demon of that is the spontaneously present three appearances.

original: mthong lhun gnas bde don thugs phrad rtogs so ma lhug pa rang tang 'dris pas gshin rje bsgral/_/
analyzed: mthong lhun gnas bde don thugs phrad rtogs so ma lhug pa rang tang 'dris pas gshin rje bsgral/_/
translated: The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.🔽The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.🔽The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.🔽The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.

translated: The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.🔽The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.🔽The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.

original: 'gro ba khyad par du bsgrub po brnyas/_/phyi nang gsang don bar chad bsal phyir mthong🔽ba 'dir bsdus/_/'gal ba 'gyur na yang sprul dpa' bos don bar chod bzhi po don rtogs pas
analyzed: 'gro ba khyad par du bsgrub po brnyas/_/phyi nang gsang don bar chad bsal phyir mthong ba 'dir bsdus/_/'gal ba 'gyur na yang sprul dpa' bos don bar chod bzhi po don rtogs pas
translated: The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.

original: cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin  rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/
analyzed: cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin  rje gshed por bsgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: The natural state of the three kayas is the three spontaneously present appearances.

original: nang phyi bar lding ba'i bar du gcod pa'i rang la gnas pa gzhan nas snang bar spyi gzhi brtshams tshhul bshags sgrib pa
analyzed: nang phyi bar lding ba'i bar du gcod pa'i rang la gnas pa gzhan nas snang bar spyi gzhi brtshams tshhul bshags sgrib pa
translated: The inner, outer, and intermediate obstacles that arise from within yourself are purified in the universal basis of the all-base.

original: sbyangs/_/dka' bas byas pa'i dge bas bar chod bzhi po kun srungs lhun gnas grub/_/🔽thig le nyag cig rang sar gnas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i 'jam dpal du shog_/thig le nyag
analyzed: sbyangs/_/dka' bas byas pa'i dge bas bar chod bzhi po kun srungs lhun gnas grub/_/ thig le nyag cig rang sar gnas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i 'jam dpal du shog_/thig le nyag
translated: Protect yourself from all four obstacles with the virtue of difficult deeds, and spontaneously accomplish the goal.🔽May I become Manjushri, the guide who leads beings to the single sphere abiding in its own place.

original: gcig sar gnas 'gro ba'i 'dren pa 'jam /gdams pa nges pa'i
analyzed: gcig sar gnas 'gro ba'i 'dren pa 'jam /gdams pa nges pa'i
translated: The guide who leads beings to the single sphere abiding in its own place is Manjushri.

original: don ldan lta sgom spyod pa la the tshom spongs la bsgrubs//_//🔽chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub
analyzed: don ldan lta sgom spyod pa la the tshom spongs la bsgrubs//_// chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed por bsgrub
translated: Abandon doubt in the view, meditation, and conduct endowed with the definitive meaning of the instructions, and practice.🔽The method of accomplishing all phenomena as Arya Manjushri Yamantaka

translated: was composed by the great master Manjushrimitra.🔽It is complete.
